review: The interface is very user friendly, I would give it 5 stars but the device has issues when trying to get Netflix running. It does not come installed from the factory. When trying to install the netflix app it gives an error, what I did was do a system update and re-downloaded the netflix app; initially it gave the same error but started to download! The other con, which is minor, the voice search function only works within amazons apps. It does not work inside the netflix app.
